alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued December 17 at 4:07AM EST until December 19 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 3 feet in the most persistent lake snows across the Tug Hill Plateau. * WHERE...The Eastern Lake Ontario Region. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult at times with deep snow cover on roads and poor visibility. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4376 7558 4387 7577 4382 7593 4381 7629 4363 7623 4356 7643 4359 7625 4352 7623 4355 7604 4353 7566 TIME Y22M12D17T0900Z-Y22M12D18T0000Z COORD...4391 7555 4392 7588 4388 7592 4383 7629 4370 7623 4361 7623 4358 7619 4355 7589 4356 7577 4364 7551 TIME Y22M12D18T0000Z-Y22M12D18T0600Z COORD...4391 7540 4395 7551 4398 7578 4392 7612 4385 7629 4367 7623 4364 7614 4361 7581 4364 7566 4373 7550 TIME Y22M12D18T0600Z-Y22M12D18T1200Z COORD...4382 7536 4397 7551 4400 7583 4396 7608 4389 7622 4388 7637 4379 7627 4367 7623 4364 7614 4362 7567 TIME Y22M12D18T1200Z-Y22M12D18T1800Z COORD...4387 7514 4379 7548 4391 7576 4385 7604 4376 7620 4361 7620 4353 7611 4346 7581 4342 7550 4360 7513 TIME Y22M12D18T1800Z-Y22M12D19T0000Z COORD...4342 7550 4348 7542 4346 7581 4355 7565 4363 7623 4345 7663 4324 7648 4322 7608 4316 7588 4340 7586 TIME Y22M12D19T0000Z-Y22M12D20T0000Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
